opcode.name: OP_TradeRequestAck
opcode.comment: Trade request recipient is acknowledging they are able to trade

opcode.name: OP_GuildTributeStatus
opcode.comment: Guild tribute stats send on zone

opcode.name: OP_TraderShop
opcode.comment: old OpenTraderCode right-click on a trader in bazaar

opcode.name: OP_Save
opcode.comment: Client asking server to save user state

opcode.name: OP_Trader
opcode.comment: People turning trader on and off

opcode.name: OP_WhoAllResponse
opcode.comment: Need a new sizechecktype for this one?

opcode.name: OP_HPUpdate
opcode.comment: old NpcHpUpdateCode Update HP % of a PC or NPC

opcode.name: OP_AAExpUpdate
opcode.comment: Receiving AA experience. Also when percent to AA changes.

opcode.name: OP_MoveItem
opcode.comment: Client moving an item from one slot to another

opcode.name: OP_ItemLinkResponse
opcode.comment: old ItemInfoCode. sizechecktype should be none?

opcode.name: OP_ClientReady
opcode.comment: Client requesting zone in packet, etc

opcode.name: OP_RequestZoneChange
opcode.comment: Send by server when a click causes zone. Also, origin

opcode.name: OP_RequestZoneChange2
opcode.comment: Send by server when porting to zone safe point. 24 bytes. Looks like same struct as OP_RequestZoneChange

opcode.name: OP_SendZonePoints
opcode.comment: Coords in a zone that will port you to another zone

opcode.name: OP_ItemLinkText
opcode.comment: sent from server when player or groupmate loots item

opcode.name: OP_ConsentResponse
opcode.comment: Server replying with consent information after /consent

opcode.name: OP_AckPacket
opcode.comment: Appears to be generic ack at the presentation level

opcode.name: OP_TraderBuy
opcode.comment: buy from a trader in bazaar

opcode.name: OP_ManaChange
opcode.comment: Mana change. Bards send this up with no size. Casters receive this for mana updates.

opcode.name: OP_DenyResponse
opcode.comment: Server replying with deny information after /deny

opcode.name: OP_TradeAcceptClick
opcode.comment: One side clicks Accept on the trade

opcode.name: OP_ConfirmDelete
opcode.comment: Client sends this to server to confirm op_deletespawn

opcode.name: OP_MobHealth
opcode.comment: health sent when a player clicks on the mob

opcode.name: OP_AAAction
opcode.comment: Used for changing percent, buying? and activating skills

opcode.name: OP_GMSummon
opcode.comment: Request to summon spawns or players. Includes /corpse requests

opcode.name: OP_InitialMobHealth
opcode.comment: Initial health sent when a player clicks on the mob. Subsequent updated will be OP_MobHealth

opcode.name: OP_SpawnRename
opcode.comment: Spawns getting renamed after initial NewSpawn

opcode.name: OP_UpdateAA
opcode.comment: Request server to send aa update

opcode.name: OP_SendTributes
opcode.comment: Request server to send tributes update. 4 bytes?

opcode.name: OP_SendGuildTributes
opcode.comment: Request server to send guild tributes update. 4 bytes?

opcode.name: OP_WeaponEquip1
opcode.comment: Sent when player equips or unequips weapon

opcode.name: OP_TaskDescription
opcode.comment: Task descriptions coming down for task window

opcode.name: OP_TaskActivity
opcode.comment: Task activity descriptions coming down for task window

opcode.name: OP_SendExpZonein
opcode.comment: Both directions. Negotiating sending of exp info.

opcode.name: OP_TGB
opcode.comment: Client telling server to set targetgroupbuff

opcode.name: OP_LevelAppearance
opcode.comment: Graphic sent when level up occurs

opcode.name: OP_MoveCoin
opcode.comment: Sent when you pickup or delete coin

opcode.name: OP_ClickObjectAction
opcode.comment: client clicks on a world container (eg forge). Also sent by the client when they close the container.

opcode.name: OP_LFGAppearance
opcode.comment: Notification when someone's lfg tag changes

opcode.name: OP_ZoneGuildList
opcode.comment: Appears to be same as OP_GuildList
